bill_title: revise provisions regarding the vesting of title to a removal agency.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise provisions regarding the vesting of title to a removal agency. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-36-9 be amended to read: 32-36-9. Notwithstanding any statutes to the contrary, title to any abandoned or junk motor vehicle, any impounded vehicle, or other scrap metal shall vest in the removal agency after a period of thirty days from the date on which notice was sent under § 32-36-8 or if the removal agency is a law enforcement officer, the title shall vest after a period of ninety days from the date notice was sent. The record holder of title or the lien holder may reclaim the motor vehicle or other scrap metal. The lien holder and record holder of title shall notify the department in writing within thirty days of their intent to reclaim the motor vehicle. However, if the record holder of title fails to claim and remove the motor vehicle or other scrap metal within thirty days after mailing of notice, title to the vehicle is irrevocably vested in the removal agency. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise provisions regarding the vesting of title to a removal agency. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-36-9 be amended to read: 32-36-9. Notwithstanding any statutes to the contrary, title to any abandoned or junk motor vehicle, any impounded vehicle, or other scrap metal shall vest in the removal agency after a period of thirty days from the date on which notice was sent under § 32-36-8 or if the removal agency is a law enforcement agency, the title shall vest after a period of ninety days from the date notice was sent to the owner, lien holder, and insurer. The record holder of title, the insurer, or the lien holder may reclaim the motor vehicle or other scrap metal. The lien holder and record holder of title shall notify the department in The record holder of title, insurer, or lien holder shall notify the department in writing within thirty days of their intent to reclaim the motor vehicle. However, if the record holder of title, insurer, or lien holder fails to claim and remove the motor vehicle or other scrap metal within thirty days after mailing of notice, title to the vehicle is irrevocably vested in the removal agency. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
